Html:
Hi everybody,
I use GMap.Net in my c# project. That is really powerful.
But I have a problem, and I happy if anyone solved it for me:

When I use the mouse wheel in all of the form's environment (whether the mouse cursor on the gmap control or not) MouseWheel event of gmap control works. I want MouseWheel event works when the mouse cursor on the gmap control.

Can anyone help me?
